016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.neo4j.client;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.lang.Enums;
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.JsonNodeFactory;
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
022import org.neo4j.graphdb.Result;
023
024import java.util.function.Function;
025
026public record RowModel(Result.ResultRow row) {
027
028    public JsonNode getJsonNode(String name) {
029        return Cypher.toJsonNode(row.get(name));
030    }
031
032    public NodeModel getNode(String name) {
033        return new NodeModel(row.getNode(name));
034    }
035
036    public NodeModel getNode(Enum<?> name) {
037        return new NodeModel(row.getNode(name.name()));
038    }
039
040    public <T> T toModel(Function<ObjectNode, T> creator, Enum<?>... fields) {
041        ObjectNode json = JsonNodeFactory.instance.objectNode();
042        for (Enum<?> enumConstant : fields) {
043            json.set(Enums.toField(enumConstant), this.getJsonNode(Enums.toField(enumConstant)));
044        }
045        return creator.apply(json);
046    }
047}
